mapper.select: select memPoint from user where memId = #{memId}
mapper.update: UPDATE user set memPw = #{memPw}, memName = #{memName}, memEmail = #{memEmail}, memPhone = #{memPhone}, memZipcode = #{memZipCode}, memAddr1 = #{memAddr1}, memAddr2 = #{memAddr2} WHERE memId = #{memId}
mapper.select: SELECT o.orderProdNo, o.orderNo, o.prodNo, o.prodAmount, o.prodCost, p.prodName, img.prodThumbName FROM orderProd o JOIN product p ON o.prodNo = p.prodNo JOIN prodImage img ON o.prodNo = img.prodNo WHERE o.orderNo = #{orderNo}
